name: Cisco | SCOS | Vendor | Cisco | SCOS | Security | Attack | Attack Detected #1
event_class__name: Vendor | Cisco | SCOS | Security | Attack | Attack Detected

patterns.value_re: ^Attack detected: Attack from IP address (?P<from_ip>\S+), to IP address (?P<to_ip>\S+), from (?P<from_side>\S+) side, protocol (?P<proto>\S+)\. (?P<open_flows>\d+) open flows per second detected, (?P<suspected_flows>\d+) DDoS/DoS suspected flows per second detected\. Action is: (?P<action>\S+)\.$

name: Cisco | SCOS | Vendor | Cisco | SCOS | Security | Attack | Attack Detected #2
event_class__name: Vendor | Cisco | SCOS | Security | Attack | Attack Detected

patterns.value_re: ^Attack detected: Attack from IP address (?P<from_ip>\S+), from (?P<from_side>\S+) side, protocol (?P<proto>\S+)\. (?P<open_flows>\d+) open flows per second detected, (?P<suspected_flows>\d+) DDoS/DoS suspected flows per second detected\. Action is: (?P<action>\S+)\.$

name: Cisco | SCOS | Vendor | Cisco | SCOS | Security | Attack | Attack Ended #1
event_class__name: Vendor | Cisco | SCOS | Security | Attack | End-of-attack detected

patterns.value_re: ^End-of-attack detected: Attack from IP address (?P<from_ip>\S+), to IP address (?P<to_ip>\S+), from (?P<from_side>\S+) side, protocol (?P<proto>\S+)\. Action is: (?P<action>\S+)\. Duration (?P<duration>\S+\sseconds), attack comprised of (?P<flows>\d+) flows\.$

patterns.value_re: ^End-of-attack detected: Attack from IP address (?P<from_ip>\S+), from (?P<from_side>\S+) side, protocol (?P<proto>\S+)\. Action is: (?P<action>\S+)\. Duration (?P<duration>\S+\sseconds), attack comprised of (?P<flows>\d+) flows\.$
